sourcesContent:
<template>
      <v-col cols="12" sm="10" md="10" style="padding-left:20%;">
          <v-date-picker v-model="date" type="month" @input="setDate(date)" locale="pt" min="1950-01-01" :max="dateMax" class="inputdate"></v-date-picker>
      </v-col>
</template>

<script lang="ts">
import {
  Component,
  Vue,
  Prop,
  Watch
} from 'vue-property-decorator';
import {
  Action, Getter
} from 'vuex-class';
@Component
export default class FomentoMensal extends Vue {
  @Prop() clearFields!: any; 

  private month: any = null;
  private menu: boolean = false;
  private date = new Date().toISOString().substr(0, 10);
  private dateFormatted = this.formatDate(new Date().toISOString().substr(0, 10));
  private dateMax = new Date().toISOString().substr(0, 10);
  
  @Watch('clearFields')
  public async onPropertyChangeds(value: any, oldValue: any): Promise < void > {
    this.month = null;
    this.$emit('resetClearFields');
  }
  
  public setDate(data: any): void {
    this.menu = false;
  }

  public formatDate(date: string): any {
    if (!date) return null;
    const [year, month, day] = date.split('-');
    return `${day}/${month}/${year}`;
  }

  public parseDate(date: any): any {
    if (!date) return null;

    const [day, month, year] = date.split('/');
    return `${year}-${month.padStart(2, '0')}-${day.padStart(2, '0')}`;
  }

  @Watch('date')
  public async onPropertyChangedsDate(value: any, oldValue: any): Promise < void > {
    this.dateFormatted = this.formatDate(value);
  }


  public SendMonth(month: any): void {
    this.$emit('getMonth', month);
  }
}
</script>
<style scoped>
.inputdate{
  height: 100px;
}
</style>
